Comment.value:
How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Halfling


Brownie

Syntax: Brownie

Stats: 
+4 Dexterity, +2 Charisma

Feats: 
Dodge, Mobility

Skills: 
+10 Hide, +10 Move Silently

Special Ability: 
Brownie Cunning: Brownies have mastered the art of escaping from deadly situations and using their size to an advantage. Once per day, for two minutes, the brownie gains a speed boost (Very fast) and +5 Dodge AC. Does not stack with Monk speed.
Restrictions: Can only use tiny weapons and cloth armor



Goblin

Syntax: Goblin

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, -2 charisma

Immunities: 
10% Acid

Special Ability: 
At level 3 Goblins master the art of using spiders in combat. Once per day, he can mount his spider gaining the following bonuses for 1 round per 3 character level to a max of 20 rounds.
+1 Attack a round, +2 Attack Bonus, +4 Dodge AC Bonus



Kobold

Syntax: Kobold

Stats: 
+2 Dexerity, -2 Constitution, +4 Charisma

Skills: 
+8 Lore, +10 Craft Weapon, +10 Craft Armor

Immunities: 
10% Acid

Special Ability: The Kobold, one time per day, can use an explosive doing 1d10 fire + 1d10 bludgeoning damage per character level to ALL targets in a 20m radius.



Pixie

Syntax: Pixie

Stats: 
-2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +2 Charisma

Feats: 
Spring Attack, Whirlwind Attack

Immunities: 
10% Magical

Special Ability: 
Lock Opening. The Pixie can open any lock without fail, one time per day, as long as a key is not required.

Restrictions: Can only use tiny weapons and cloth armor

Subraces - Halfling


Brownie

Syntax: Brownie

Stats: 
+4 Dexterity, +2 Charisma

Feats: 
Dodge, Mobility

Skills: 
+10 Hide, +10 Move Silently

Special Ability: 
Brownie Cunning: Brownies have mastered the art of escaping from deadly situations and using their size to an advantage. Once per day, for two minutes, the brownie gains a speed boost (Very fast) and +5 Dodge AC. Does not stack with Monk speed.
Restrictions: Can only use tiny weapons and cloth armor

Syntax: Goblin

+2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, -2 charisma

Immunities: 
10% Acid

Special Ability: 
At level 3 Goblins master the art of using spiders in combat. Once per day, he can mount his spider gaining the following bonuses for 1 round per 3 character level to a max of 20 rounds.
+1 Attack a round, +2 Attack Bonus, +4 Dodge AC Bonus



Kobold

+2 Dexerity, -2 Constitution, +4 Charisma

Skills:

Immunities: 
10% Acid

Special Ability: The Kobold, one time per day, can use an explosive doing 1d10 fire +1d10 bludgeoningdamage per character level to ALL targets in a 20m radius.

Immunities:

Special Ability:

Restrictions: Can only use tiny weapons and cloth armor
